STEPS TO REPRODUCE
1. run mochitest editor/libeditor/html/tests/browserscope/test_richtext2.html

ACTUAL RESULTS

PLATFORMS AND BUILDS TESTED
Bug occurs in a local mozilla-central DEBUG build on Linux x86-64
